labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: hlj.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://hlj.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fhlj.com) ### Comment Username: @thedicemaster > adguard is blocking the search bar at the top, the removal of this search bar unhinges the entire header and causes a menu that is supposed to be off-screen until opened to always be on screen. > > in portrait view on most mobile devices the alignment issues aren't visible as auto-wrapping forces it back into alignment, but the alignment issues are visible on devices with wide screens(foldables) and in landscape view. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](http://res.cloudinary.com/adguard/image/private/s---6cGyZBa--/v1661283380/asjj6hh9n7nplkw90g0n.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/4rfL18u.jpg)

comment.body:
You have too many filter lists enabled.
Please disable them one by one and check which one causes this issue (I suppose that it may be caused by `Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts`).
